entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning: observer object was not disposed manually with Dispose() and Missing Dispose call on local IDisposable (cs/local-not-disposed) #26871
  • .NET MAUI does not show in Visual Studio #26870
  • Svg rasterizes empty transparent png if it has height/width specified in em units #26869
  • Error in InitializeComponent() System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' When starting an application #26866
  • Shell Content Title Not Rendering in Full-Screen Mode on Mac Catalyst #26864
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position #26863
  • Dark/light theme button is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26862
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Project option is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26861
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Tags are not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26860
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Error building with XCODE 16.1 #26859
  • [Windows] FileResult(string fullPath) not initialized properly #26858
  • ListView ScrollTo position always remains at the start even when set to Center or End #26857
  • `MenuFlyoutItem`s programmatically added to `MenuFlyoutSubItem`s are not visible. #26856

Closed

  • Statusbar color changes when opening a modal page on Android #26867
  • Confusing MAUI Build Warning #26855
  • MAUI .NET9.0 does not build, getting lots of errors VS17.12.3 #26688

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position - fix #26868
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [Windows] Fixed the exception when using CarouselView PeekAreaInsets Property in OnSizeAllocated method #26865
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 64 #26823
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [Windows] Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    platform/windows 🪟, p/0, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Header and Footer template is not visible in CollectionView #26844
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
